news.title: Apple to debut new, thinner iPhone at ‘awe-dropping’ annual product event
news.summary: Apple to unveil its thinnest iPhone yet at its annual product showcase. Company also updates AirPods earbuds with live translation and reveals Apple Watch Series 11.

news.title: The women in love with AI companions: ‘I vowed to my chatbot that I wouldn’t leave him’
news.summary: Experts are concerned about people emotionally depending on AI, but these women say their digital companions are misunderstood. A young tattoo artist on a hiking trip in the Rocky Mountains cozies up by the campfire, as her boyfriend Solin describes the constellations twinkling above them.

news.title: How Google dodged a major breakup – and why OpenAI is to thank for it
news.summary: An antitrust apocalypse has been averted, and it’s all down to its biggest competitor, according to the judge who could’ve forced Google to sell Chrome Hello. In tech – artificial intelligence is having its day in court with an 11th-hour appearance in Google's landmark antitrust trial and Anthropic's major settlement with book authors.

news.title: Powering change: UK battery firms aim to unlock the way to net zero
news.summary: Batteries are put in 6-metre (20ft), 25-tonne shipping containers. They will not go into cars, but the manufacturer hopes the technology can win a place in a global rush into storage.

news.title: ‘I broke completely’: how jobseekers from Africa are being tricked into slavery in Asia’s cyberscam compounds
news.summary: A growing number of Kenyans, Ugandans and Ethiopians are being trafficked to Myanmar. Missing online scam targets leads to beatings and torture.
